author: Legonat
title: First to review!
review:
• This set is boring without other racers tracks.

            Pros

            Track can fold up,

            Two cars,

            Good parts,

            Toll barrier can move up and down.


            Cons

            Not enough room for a street chase,

            Car cannot crash though the barrier like on the box,

            Stickers,

            Toll booth is way out of scale with the cars.


             Overall a 3/5

author: Si_UKNZ
title: Great cars
review:
Pros

  • Police car has great details and design especially with stickers attached, blue car not half bad either.
  • Nice to have some fast cars - there arent nearly enough of them in these 'racers' sets.
  • Road furniture is fun for play, and overall a good old fashioned cops and robbers play experience
  • Great value especially considering the price of normal road pieces.

Cons

  • Road furniture is fragile once built
  • Can be hard to keep the road lying flat (but a bit of bending back and to generally solves this)
  • Blue car windscreen is a bit too low profile to be realistic.
  • Very simple build - but it is what it is so you wouldnt expect that it'd be too comple

Great cars. Think of these tiny racers sets as being more comparable to die-cast model cars in size and play experience, and with that in mind this is one of the better ones.
